data.title: Actress Sonia Agarwal Personal Life Struggles | Telugu
data.meta_description: Actors In The Industry Are As Concerned About Their Career But Fails Personal Life. Especially Case Of Marriages They A Hurry And Ruin Lives Shortest Possible Time. The Situation Heroine 7G Brindavan Col.Actress Sonia Agarwal Personal Life Struggles | Telugu - Actress, Agarwal, Krishna, Netflix, Personal, Sonia, Telugu, Telugustop
data.text:
Actors in the industry are as concerned about their career but fails in personal life.Especially in the case of their marriages, they are in a hurry and ruin their lives in the shortest possible time.The situation of the heroine of 7G Brindavan Colony has also changed.7G Brindavan Colony is a 2004 film directed by Selvaraghavan.The film was released in Telugu and Tamil.It stars Ravi Krishna and Sonia Agarwal.The film was a huge hit.Meanwhile, the heroine of this movie Sonia Agarwal has also got divorced.Let‚Äôs find out what actually happened.Sonia Agarwal is an actress from the Telugu and Tamil film industry.

She impressed the audience with her beauty and acting.She was not only an actress but also a model.She made her film debut in 2002 with the film Nee Premakai.Prior to this film, she had acted in several serials on television.

After that he stepped into the Kannada film industry.She made a name for herself in 2003 with a film directed by Selvaraghavan.The same movie was remade in Telugu under the title ‚ÄòNenu‚Äô.7G Brindavan Colony got a good craze with the movie.She fell in love with director Selva Raghavan for some time and got married in 2006.Sonia Agarwal is away from movies after marriage.

They later separated in 2009 due to mental problems.This topic went unnoticed by most and has recently gone viral on Netflix again.

It has given a re-entry to the film industry to step into movies again after a divorce.During that time she got opportunities in many films and acted in supporting roles.

Temper also played a minor role in the film.In fact, after she divorced her husband, she got more opportunities in the role of mother.

But she knew he would not accept those roles.With that she only acts in small roles.

Now it is known that she is focusing on her beauty and her physique and is trying for heroine roles.It remains to be seen whether she will get heroine opportunities from the Tollywood industry and the Tamil film industry.

It is learned that she is currently single without remarrying.telugu,telugu news,telugu channel,telugustop,sonia agarwal biography,sonia agarwal scenes,sonia agarwal husband name,sonia agarwal marriage video,sonia agarwal movies list,sonia agarwal movies,sonia agarwal,7g rainbow colony,sonia agarwal life secrets,heroines life secrets,sonia agarwal personal life,sonia agarwal real life,sonia agarwal news,sonia agarwal selva,sonia agarwal selvaraghavan divorce,sonia agarwal selvaraghavan,7g brindavan colony heroine #SoniaAgarwal #7GBridnavanColony #TollywoodActress
